title: RAW MARINATED MUSHROOM RECIPE
directions: 2. Place sliced mushrooms into a wide, shallow bowl (or a plate with a deep lip).
3. Pour the oil and soy sauce over the mushrooms.
4. Gently stir mushrooms until lightly but thoroughly coated in oil and soy sauce.
5. Let mushrooms sit for approximately 5 minutes. (Stir occassionally if possible.)
